{{Infobox hotel | hotel_name = Grand Hyatt San Francisco | logo = | logo_width = | image = Grand Hyatt San Francisco.jpg | image_width = 250px | location = [[United States]] | address = 345 Stockton Street
[[San Francisco]], [[California]] | chain = [[Global Hyatt Corporation]] | coordinates = {{coord|37.78911|-122.40723|region:US-CA_type:landmark|display=title,inline}} | opening_date = 1972 | closing_date = | developer = | architect = [[Skidmore, Owings & Merrill]] | operator = [[Hyatt]] | owner = | number_of_rooms = 685 | number_of_suites = | number_of_restaurants = Grandviews Restaurant | floor_area = | floors = 35 | height = {{Convert|108|m|abbr=on}} | parking = | website = [http://grandsanfrancisco.hyatt.com/hyatt/hotels/index.jsp grandsanfrancisco.hyatt.com] | footnotes = {{emporis|118863}}{{Skyscraperpage|13242}}{{Structurae|s0021876}} }} '''Grand Hyatt San Francisco''' is a [[skyscraper]] hotel located on-halve block north of [[Union Square (San Francisco)|Union Square]] in [[San Francisco]], [[California]]. The 35-[[storey]], {{Convert|108|m|abbr=on}} tower was completed in 1972, and has 685 rooms. ==See also== {{Portal|San Francisco Bay Area}} * [[List of tallest buildings in San Francisco|San Francisco's tallest buildings]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://grandsanfrancisco.hyatt.com/hyatt/hotels/index.jsp Grand Hyatt San Francisco website] * [http://www.hyatt.com/hyatt/index.jsp Hyatt Hotels and Resorts corporate website] {{Buildings in San Francisco|state=collapsed}} [[Category:Skyscraper hotels in San Francisco, California]] [[Category:Skyscrapers between 100 and 149 meters]] [[Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1972]]
